Text:
to anyone who can please help me.

when i download torrents some of them are just 1 file for example a family guy file is 173MB, those i can download and play with VLC player.

But it happens a lot that the torrent is devided in 15 little file of each 19,0MB, and those i can download but I can't ever watch them after.

can someone please help me?
thx

wastedbrat - Are you a bot automatically pasting that comment into things? If so, thank you for not going on about some lousy virus ridden page like your brothers. If not, stop posting the same thing everywhere and download winrar or winzip, install the program of your choice and then just right click any of those small files you mentioned and choose Extract here. Then it will create that larger file that you can view in VLC.
Perfect!! Brilliant quality, REALLY fast download! THANK YOU EZTV!!
